meanings.sent1: She is known as one of the flirters in our group.
meanings.sent2: The flirters at the party were having a great time.
meanings.sent3: The flirters giggled and teased each other playfully.
meanings.sent4: The garden was full of colorful butterflies, fluttering around like flirters.
meanings.sent5: The flirters wore bright smiles and made everyone feel special.

meanings.definition: To behave amorously without serious intent.
meanings.sent1: He flirters with everyone he meets, just for fun.
meanings.sent2: She flirters with her crush whenever they talk.
meanings.sent3: The cat flirters with the yarn, but never actually plays with it.
meanings.sent4: The wind flirters with the leaves, dancing through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The sun flirters with the clouds, peeking out from behind them playfully.

meanings.definition: To court triflingly or act amorously without serious intentions.
meanings.sent1: They flirters with each other at the cafe, laughing and chatting.
meanings.sent2: The actors flirters on stage, portraying a romantic scene.
meanings.sent3: The birds flirters in the trees, chirping sweet melodies to each other.
meanings.sent4: The waves flirters with the shore, gently caressing the sand.
meanings.sent5: The flowers flirters with the bees, inviting them to pollinate.
